original_text: I will establish his kingdom forever if he is unswerving in carrying out my commands and laws, as is being done at this time.’
korean_text: 그가 만일 나의 계명과 법도를 힘써 준행하기를 오늘과 같이 하면 내가 그의 나라를 영원히 견고하게 하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will establish his kingdom forever
in carrying out my commands and laws
as is being done at this time
